content: hill country beanie materials one skein lion brand wool ease thick and quick size p 11 5 mm crochet hook scissors needle for weaving in ends notes my own design this hat is crocheted flat then seamed and cinched closed at the top you will chain 1 only at the end of even numbered row the slip_stitch stitches are the top of hat hdcss stitches middle of hat and ssblo stitches bottom of hat stitches chain- chain slip_stitch-slip_stitch ssblo- slip_stitch back loop only hdcss- half_double_crochet slip_stitch special stitch hdcss yarn over insert hook in stitch yarn over pull through stitch and all loops it s the same as a regular slip_stitch but with a yarn over at the beginning chain 20 row 1 slip_stitch 4 bottom of hat hdcss 11 middle of hat slip_stitch 5 top of hat turn row 2 slip_stitch 5 hdcss 11 ssblo 4 chain 1 turn row 3 ssblo 4 hdcss 11 slip_stitch 5 turn even number row 4 through 46 repeat row 2 odd number row 5 through 45 repeat row 3 at row 46 layed flat my hat measured 15 across the bottom edge and 9 ¼ height you can adjust number of row for desired width making sure to end on even numbered row fold hat in half slip_stitch closed from bottom to top leaving a long tail to weave through around the top to cinch closed weave in ends and add a pom pom if desired lori bennett kramer @heartoftexashandmade hill country beanie copyright @heartoftexashandmade lori bennett kramer
